column4: can i still get xmms or is it only xmms2? streamtuner wont let me listen to radio
and how do i enable compiz , any help is appreciated :-)
what else can i get to work with streamtuner to listen to radio?
Amarok, Banshee, Rhythmbox, Audacious, Quod Libet, and others are much more modern and can all play internet radio.
